title: Shadow armor
summaries: Shadow armor is an armor set that consists of the Shadow Helmet, Shadow Scalemail, and Shadow Greaves. The individual pieces provide a total of 19 defense, equal to its Crimson counterpart, Crimson armor.

On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, each of the 3 pieces provide a +5% boost to universal critical strike chance (for a total of +15%), while wearing all 3 pieces at once grants an additional set bonus of +15% movement speed and acceleration.

On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, each of the 3 pieces provide a +7% boost to melee attack speed (for a total of +21%), while wearing all 3 pieces at once grants an additional set bonus of +15% movement speed.

Wearing a full set causes the player to display an afterimage effect during motion (similar to Necro armor), emit shadow particles, and will cause the Rocket Boots to emit purple flames (this does not occur with Spectre Boots or any of its derivatives).
Crafting a full set requires a total of 60 Demonite Bars (180 / 240 Demonite Ore) and 45 Shadow Scales. Defeating the Eater of Worlds twice can provide enough to craft a full set.
Shadow armor pieces are interchangeable with pieces from the Ancient Shadow armor set, while still providing the same 15% increased movement speed set bonus, but not the afterimage effect.
